dataModel.title: Vegetation Plots Database Component Description: taxonObservation
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table contains the author's determination of a taxon and the overall cover of that taxon.
entity.entityDescription: This table stores information about the original identification by the author of the plot and the taxonomic authority used by that author (i.e. a name - citation pair constituting a taxnomic concept). The table also contains a record of cumulative cover (cover across all strata) of the taxon when not divided into strata.

attribute.attDefinition: Database generated identifier assigned to each unique observation of a taxon in a plot.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the Observation table.
attribute.attDefinition: Link to the parent observation event of this taxon observation.
The taxon name that the author of the plot used to refer to a taxon observed within the plot.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the plantReference table.
attribute.attDefinition: The authority for the taxon that was used by the plot author. If the authority is unknown the author of the plot is the authority. For other than legacy data, this field plus plantName_ID will be sufficient to determine taxonInterpretation.plantConcept_ID.
Specifics about the accession number and location of a collection made of the taxon
Overall cover of the taxon across all strata
Total basal area of the species in the stemInferenceArea in m2/ha

attribute.attNotes: The area used to infer the coverage of the taxon, if not the same as observation.taxonInferenceArea.
attribute.attDefinition: This is the area in m2 used to infer the cover of a given taxon. Generally this should be equal to observation.taxonInferenceArea, but at times this area may be larger or smaller for a specific taxon.
